name: Excellent Shrimp Creole
author: CHRISTYT
summary: This is the best recipe I have found for Creole.  It was given to me by a Cajun.  You will not be disappointed!  (I sometimes substitute frozen peeled cooked shrimp and it comes out great).
ingredients: 1 cup finely chopped green bell pepper
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
directions: In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, pour in oil and flour to make a roux
Cook together until smooth, stirring constantly,  but do not brown
Stir in onions and saute for 2 minutes
Stir in garlic, celery, bell pepper, bay leaves, lemon juice, tomato paste, tomatoes and shrimp
Add enough water just to cover
Cook slowly until shrimp are pink and tender; stirring occasionally
Season with salt, pepper, chili powder and hot sauce to taste
